name: LOUISIANA HORSEMEN'S BENEVOLENT AND PROTECTIVE ASSOCIATION
description: Trade Association for Horsemen - Louisiana Chapter
sampleDescriptions: Horseracing Integrity and Safety Act - S4547 - bill creates a "private-sector" governing body to be the Authority that will oversee the industry.
Horseracing Integrity and Safety Act S 447 - bill creates a "private-sector" governing body to be the Authority that will oversee the industry.
